author: JanFSchulte
body:
This PR has to purposes:

- For HLT we need to be able to seed the tracking by L2 muons, which are reco::tracks and not compatible with the candidate seeding so far, which expects reco::candidate objects. 

- I noticed that when the number of candidates is zero, the current implementation falls back to running the recovery in the full pixel volume, which is of course not desired.
title: Update AreaSeededTrackingRegionsBuilder to allow seeding around reco::tracks
